byline.contributor: Rob Harris and Christopher Maag contributed reporting.

abstract: Zurana Horton is shot to death across from school in Brownsville section of Brooklyn, where she was picking up her child, when gunman on a rooftop with an automatic pistol fires at least a dozen shots at a group of rival teenagers; Horton is killed after she hovers over several children to protect them from the gunfire.
snippet: A shooting spree began about 15 minutes after the last students were dismissed from Public School 298 in Brooklyn, the police said.
lead_paragraph: A shooting spree began about 15 minutes after the last students were dismissed from Public School 298 in Brooklyn, the police said.

headline.main: Woman Trying to Shield Children Is Killed by Gunman
headline.print_headline: Gunman Kills Woman Trying to Shield Children Near a School
headline.seo: Rooftop Gunman in Brooklyn Kills Woman Trying to Shield Children
